# tutorial: https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/plot_ordination-examples.html
```{r ordination}
fname <- "../figures/ordination-PCoA.png"

cols <- met.brewer(size_pal, n_sizes) 

ps.ord <- ordinate(ps_ASV, "PCoA", "unifrac")

p1 <- plot_ordination(ps_ASV, ps.ord, type="samples", color="size.mm", title="PCoA") + 
  scale_color_manual(values=cols) + 
  labs(color = "Size [mm]") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14)   # sets text size

ggsave(fname, plot = p1, width = 6, height = 4, dpi = 300)

# Alternative
# ps.ord <- ordinate(ps_filt, "NMDS", "bray")
```
